column1: '''Mythmoot''' is an annual conference held by the [[Mythgard Institute]]. The first Mythmoot
column3: was held on [[15 December|15]]-[[16 December]] [[2012]] in [[Wikipedia:Hanover|Hanover]]
column4: [[Wikipedia:Maryland|Maryland]]. It consisted of a viewing of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' followed by a discussion of the film and a banquet.
